content: As an AI language model, I haven't seen "Oldboy," since I am not capable of watching movies or TV shows. However, I am familiar with the plot and twist at the end. "Oldboy" is a South Korean movie from 2003 that has garnered significant critical acclaim for its storyline, direction, and cinematography. The plot centers on a man who was mysteriously imprisoned for 15 years and released one day. He has to find the person responsible for his imprisonment and seek revenge against them. The plot twist at the end of the movie is one of the most shocking in film history, and it completely changes the way we view the protagonist's journey. It is definitely a movie worth watching for those who enjoy dark, twisted plotlines.
